member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.AddSpecialPregap
member.summary: Accepts the provided IStream object and saves the associated pointer to be used as data for the pre-gap for track 1.
member.param: Pointer to the provided IStream object.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.AddSubcodeRWGenerator
member.summary: Allows the addition of custom R-W subcode, provided by the IStream. The provided object must have a size equal to the number of sectors in the raw disc image * 96 bytes when the final image is created.
member.param: The subcode data (with 96 bytes per sector), where the 2 most significant bits must always be zero (as they are the P/Q bits).
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.AddTrack
member.summary: Accepts the provided IStream object and saves the interface pointer as the next track in the image.
member.param: A value, defined by , that indicates the type of data. IMAPI_CD_SECTOR_AUDIO is the only value supported by the IRawCDImageCreator.AddTrack method.
Pointer to the provided IStream object.
A LONG value within a 1 to 99 range that will be associated with the new track.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.CreateResultImage
member.summary: Creates the final IStream object based on the current settings.
member.param: Pointer to the finalized IStream object.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.get_DisableGaplessAudio
member.summary: Retrieves the current value that specifies if "Gapless Audio" recording is disabled. This property defaults to a value of VARIANT_FALSE, which disables the use of "gapless" recording between consecutive audio tracks.
member.param: A VARIANT_BOOL value that specifies if "Gapless Audio" is disabled. A value of VARIANT_FALSE indicates that "Gapless Audio" is disabled; VARIANT_TRUE indicates that it is enabled.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.get_ExpectedTableOfContents
member.summary: Gets the SCSI-form table of contents for the resulting disc.
member.param: The SCSI-form table of contents for the resulting disc. Accuracy of this value depends on IRawCDImageCreator.get_ExpectedTableOfContents being called after all image properties have been set.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.get_LastUsedUserSectorInImage
member.summary: Retrieves the number of total used sectors on the current media, including any overhead between existing tracks.
member.param: Pointer to a LONG value that indicates the number of total used sectors on the media.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.get_MediaCatalogNumber
member.summary: Sets the Media Catalog Number (MCN) for the entire audio disc.
member.param: Pointer to a BSTR value that represents the current MCN associated with the audio disc.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.get_NumberOfExistingTracks
member.summary: Retrieves the number of existing audio tracks on the media.
member.param: Pointer to a LONG value that indicates the number of audio tracks that currently exist on the media.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.get_ResultingImageType
member.summary: Retrieves the value that specifies the type of image file that will be generated.
member.param: Pointer to an enumeration that defines the current type set for the image file.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.get_StartingTrackNumber
member.param: Pointer to a LONG value that represents the starting track number.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.get_StartOfLeadout
member.summary: Retrieves the value that defines the LBA for the start of the Leadout. This method can be utilized to determine if the image can be written to a piece of media by comparing it against the LastPossibleStartOfLeadout for the media.
member.param: Pointer to a LONG value that represents the LBA for the start of the Leadout.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.get_StartOfLeadoutLimit
member.summary: Retrieves the current StartOfLeadoutLimit property value. This value specifies if the resulting image is required to fit on a piece of media with a StartOfLeadout greater than or equal to the LBA.
member.param: Pointer to a LONG value that represents the current StartOfLeadoutLimit.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.get_TrackInfo
member.summary: Retrieves an indexed property, which takes a LONG value with a range of 1 to 99 as the index to determine which track the user is querying. The returned object is then queried/set for the particular per-track property of interest.
member.param: A LONG value within a 1 to 99 range that is used to specify which track is queried.
A pointer to a pointer to an object that contains information about the track associated with the specified trackInfo index value.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.put_DisableGaplessAudio
member.summary: Sets the value that specifies if "Gapless Audio" recording is disabled. This property defaults to a value of VARIANT_FALSE, which disables the use of "gapless" recording between consecutive audio tracks.
member.param: A VARIANT_BOOL value that specifies if "Gapless Audio" is disabled. Setting a value of VARIANT_FALSE disables "Gapless Audio", while VARIANT_TRUE enables it.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.put_MediaCatalogNumber
member.summary: Retrieves the Media Catalog Number (MCN) for the entire audio disc.
member.param: A BSTR value that represents the MCN to associate with the audio disc.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.put_ResultingImageType
member.summary: Sets the value that defines the type of image file that will be generated.
member.param: An enumeration that defines the type of image file.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.put_StartingTrackNumber
member.param: A LONG value that represents the starting track number.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

member.name: IRawCDImageCreator.put_StartOfLeadoutLimit

summary.para:
Sets the StartOfLeadoutLimit property value. This value specifies if the resulting image is required to fit on a piece of media with a StartOfLeadout greater than or equal to the LBA specified.
Note The maximum supported value for this property is 398,099, which equates to MSF 88:29:74.

member.param: Pointer to a LONG value that represents the current StartOfLeadoutLimit.
member.returns: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation.

summary.para: Use this interface to create a RAW CD image for use in writing to CD media in Disc-at-Once (DAO) mode. Images created with this interface can be written to CD media using the interface.
To create an instance of this interface, call the CoCreateInstance function. Use__uuidof(MsftRawCDImageCreator) for the class identifier and __uuidof(IRawCDImageCreator) for the interface identifier.
